Events that occurred on 21 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1889 – Edith Bratt is born in Gloucestershire.
1913 – Actor Heron Carvic is born.
1934 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 8a.
1945 – Actor Martin Shaw is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
